main.name: Shelby Anne Rothman
main.bio: Freshly educated Full Stack Web Developer looking for a great career opportunity to join a strong team of developers that would benefit from an intelligent, creative, and passionate individual like myself. I come from an educational background in Cultural Theory and Design. I excel at integrating creativity with analytical problem solving to develop clean code and user-friendly applications.
main.contactmessage: Please contact me for more information

education.description: A 12-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS.

work.title: Junior Web Developer Support
work.description: Tutor students across the nation in UX/UI, cyber and digital marketing, web development, data structures, software development and fundamentals of computer science. Fully remote; communication via Slack, Zoom, Git, and Calendly.
